title: CrowdChecked
subtitle: A chrome extension which aims to help you identify deception in news articles, by inlining discussion and debate from the community.

title: Low Poly Fox
subtitle: A low-poly rendering of a fox, made from laser cut wood.

title: Split Mechanical Keyboard
subtitle: A custom layout, acrylic mechanical keyboard.

title: Flur
subtitle: An IOS app that lets users find and contribute to geo-cached photo albums all over the world.

title: Wallee
subtitle: An Electron app which finds beautiful images to set as your desktop wallpaper.

title: Raspberry Pi Home Server
subtitle: A minimal home server made with a raspberry pi and wood.

title: Car Wash
subtitle: An IOS app that help users schedule home car washes. Think Uber for car washes.

title: Linehop
subtitle: An IOS app that lets users view the line length at various bars in the Ann Arbor area.
